Ini Penampakan Surat Tugas Ormas Jaga Parkir di Bekasi yang Jadi Polemik
07 Nov 2019, 21:11 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - Badan Pendapatan Daerah (Bapenda) Kota Bekasi mengeluarkan surat tugas bagi ormas maupun individu untuk menjaga parkir. Surat tugas jaga parkir itu ditandatangani oleh Aan Suhanda.
Pengacara Aan, RM Purwadi, mengatakan surat tugas itu tidak diberikan kepada ormas, melainkan ke tiap individu yang ditugasi menjaga parkir on the street.
"Surat itu bukan untuk ormas, melainkan secara personal diberikannya. (Parkir) on street," kata RM Purwadi di Polres Metro Bekasi, Jalan Pramuka, Kota Bekasi, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Menurut Purwadi, surat tugas jaga parkir itu sudah ada sejak 2017 lalu. Surat tugas itu tidak 'dimandatkan' kepada ormas, melainkan kepada individu.
"(Dievaluasi) tiga bulan (sekali)," imbuhnya
Akan tetapi, khusus surat tugas yang menjadi kisruh, evaluasi dilakukan satu bulan setelah masa berlaku habis.

This is the appearance of the Ormas Task Letter on Parking Protection in Bekasi, which has become a polemic
Nov 7 2019, 21:11 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - Bekasi City's Regional Revenue Agency (Bapenda) issues letters of duty for mass organizations and individuals to guard parking. The parking guard duty was signed by Aan Suhanda.
Aan's lawyer, RM Purwadi, said that the assignment letter was not given to CSOs, but to each individual assigned to guard parking on the street.
"The letter is not for mass organizations, but personally given. (Parking) on street," said RM Purwadi in Bekasi Metro Police, Jalan Pramuka, Bekasi City, Thursday (11/07/2019).
According to Purwadi, the parking guard duty has been around since 2017. The assignment letter was not 'mandated' to CSOs, but rather to individuals.
"(Evaluated) three months (once)," he added
However, specifically the assignment letter which became chaotic, the evaluation is carried out one month after the validity period expires.
